name: Repair of the house
description:
We invite you and your kids to visit the fascinating world of building games. You probably have already played games about building and repair, and you know very well how interesting and exciting these wonderful development games for children can be, because embodying your creative ideas, making your home cozy and beautiful is a very interesting activity. We present to your attention a new fascinating game about repairs - "Repair of the house".
In this wonderful game, your kids will have to be in such a wonderful role as a builder who simply needs to repair the house for himself and his family. At your disposal is a huge, but very old multi-storey house. Somewhere a window broke, somewhere off the wall the plaster fell off, and the wiring burned out somewhere and you, like a real house master, will have to fix it all, starting with the basement and ending with the attic, because building and repair is very responsible and an interesting lesson. Also your kids will need to make repairs in all rooms, carefully repair the broken furniture, decorate and paint the walls, and much more.
The home repair game will help your child become the best young craftsman and the master of all trades, will show how to make repairs in the house or apartment, promote the development of attention, wit and imagination, develop other qualities that will undoubtedly be of use to them in the further adult life. Use the whole arsenal of tools of a real builder - brushes and paints, a hammer and nails, a screwdriver and an electric drill. All these tools will help you when playing games.
To start playing a game about repairing the house you need to download and install our application to your tablet or phone. Play our game and become the best interior designer of your dream home.
